extendedInfo.description: Game designed by an 8 year old, graphics drawn by a 4 year old, and programmed by an unemployed 30 year old. This isn't Star Wars. This is Paper Wars!Spend your credits, place your fighters and frigates, and use your fingers to aim and destroy the other side before they destroy you, and save the galaxy while you're at it. What's not to like?Not Very Special Edition: This is the customary "lite" version of Paper (Star) Wars. Experience the first three chapters of this epic (haha) game, and fully playable versus mode with another human player (sharing a single device). Full version has an epic (haha) 10 chapter story mode, more ships, and an unlockable CPU skirmish mode where you earn victories to rank up.New Official Website (with getting started guide): http://www.digital-digest.com/apps/paperstarwars/Join us on Facebook:http://www.facebook.com/pages/Paper-Star-Wars/226757740697471And Twitter:http://twitter.com/PaperStarWarsFind a bug?Please post crash reports via the built-in crash reporting feature, or if you find a non crashing bug, please email paperstarwars@digital-digest.com with a full description of your bug. Thanks.

reviews.title: A for effort and fun
reviews.comment: I liked the little story book style as the game goes on. Once I figured out how to fire, I had fun. My 14 yr old son is interested too. The characters captions we funny too. Works fine on our large tablet.
reviews.author: evelyn a

reviews.title: Bad touch
reviews.comment: Bad touch for the galaxy note. Even with the s pen. I would buy the full version, but it would be a total waste
